title: Hated in Hong Kong but feted in China, the riot police becoming social media stars
text:
Hong Kong’s police force have become hate figures for protesters during months of violent clashes that peaked this week.

But across the border in China they have gained hero status where some officers have built up a huge base of adoring fans on social media.

Tensions between the Hong Kong force, once muchly admired as “Asia’s finest”, and the pro-democracy movement spiked after the shooting of two teenagers this week and the government’s introduction of a fiercely opposed face mask ban aimed at curbing street violence.
